nodes.text: The city of Iziz had a power generator that ran to several smaller generators. The smaller generators were linked to the main unit and would not function if the main unit was disabled.
During the Clone Wars, King Sanjay Rash utilized the power generator to provide energy for his battle droid forces in the city.

Around 20 BBY, the Onderon rebels saw an opportunity to help defeat the Separatist occupation in this generator. The rebels used an Armored Assault Tank they had stolen from Patrol 118 to blow up the generator, causing Iziz's power to shut down.
